title: Is it possible to transfer my account to a garena server?
body: I have a constant 200+ms so i want to transfer to garena

replies.body:
Unfortunately, no. You're only to transfer your account to a Riot-operated Region, so any region/server that Garena operates, you would be unable to transfer to.

You can find out full account transfer guide [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ). Please let me know if you have any questions.
